title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E David Buom Choat

content.rendered: The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E David Buom Choat, Ambassador of the Republic of the South Sudan to Nigeria today 16th July, 2024. Discussed bilateral matters that included but were not limited to support for South Sudan as they prepare for elections. Also discussed were viable solutions to ending the war in Sudan.
